SEARCH
Package org.wildloop

Class Prey

java.lang.Object
org.wildloop.Animal
org.wildloop.Prey
public class Prey extends Animal
Represents prey in the simulation. Prey flees from Predator objects within a specified range and gains energy through grazing.
See Also:
  • Animal
  • Predator

  • Method Details

    • generateUniqueId

      protected String generateUniqueId()
      Generates a unique identifier for the prey instance. The ID is prefixed with "PREY-" followed by an incrementing counter.
      Specified by:
      generateUniqueId in class Animal
      Returns:
      unique identifier for the prey

    • getNextMoveDirection

      protected Direction getNextMoveDirection()
      Determines the direction of prey's next move. If a predator is within FLEE_RANGE, prey flees in opposite direction. Otherwise, choose a random direction.
      Specified by:
      getNextMoveDirection in class Animal
      Returns:
      direction in which prey should move

    • eat

      protected void eat()
      Allows prey to graze, increasing its energy by GRAZE_ENERGY_GAIN.
      Specified by:
      eat in class Animal

    • createOffspring

      protected Animal createOffspring(Position position)
      Creates new prey as offspring.
      Specified by:
      createOffspring in class Animal
      Parameters:
      position - position for the new prey
      Returns:
      new prey object with initial energy equal to Animal.OFFSPRING_ENERGY
